name: Verbeeg Longstrider
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Simple Weapon Wielder: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.Multiattack: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.
actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.Sling: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d6 + 2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (3d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
